main event: A reported sighting of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) in Cincinnati, Ohio.
interesting points: The report mentions multiple flying saucers observed during the sighting., One witness describes seeing eight flying saucers separating into different directions., Observations included a bright orange object resembling a plastic capsule with fire at the bottom., A connection was made to local boys launching a hot air balloon in the area., There was an admission of regret from a witness for not observing the objects longer.
sighted object: flying saucers and a bright orange object
witness description: One civilian observer reported the sighting.
